scripts.build:frontend: cd src/sneed_mud_frontend && CANISTER_ID_SNEED_MUD_BACKEND=$(dfx canister id sneed_mud_backend) npm run build
scripts.build:frontend:staging: cd src/sneed_mud_frontend && CANISTER_ID_SNEED_MUD_BACKEND=$(dfx canister id sneed_mud_backend_staging) npm run build
scripts.deploy:ic: dfx generate sneed_mud_backend && npm run build:frontend && dfx deploy --network ic sneed_mud_backend sneed_mud_frontend
scripts.deploy:staging: dfx generate sneed_mud_backend_staging && npm run build:frontend:staging && dfx deploy --network ic sneed_mud_backend_staging && dfx deploy --network ic sneed_mud_frontend_staging
